SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT I.CTRT_NO , (CASE WHEN I.CTRT_SE = '1' THEN '자체' WHEN I.CTRT_SE = '2' THEN '조달' END) AS CTRT_SE , I.BID_PBLANC_NO , I.CTRT_NM , TO_CHAR(I.BID_PBLANC_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BID_PBLANC_DT , TO_CHAR(I.BID_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BID_DT , TO_CHAR(I.CTRT_DT_FROM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CTRT_DT_FROM , TO_CHAR(I.CTRT_DT_TO, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CTRT_DT_TO , I.REGIST_ENTRPS_CD , I.PLAN_AMT , I.CTRT_AMT , NVL(J.RPRSNTV,J.ENTRPS_NM) CNSTRTR , GAM_GETENTRPSNM(I.REGIST_ENTRPS_CD, 1) AS REGIST_ENTRPS_NM , J.ENTRPS_NM FROM CTRT_INFO_F I LEFT OUTER JOIN CTRT_JOIN_CONTR_F J ON I.CTRT_NO = J.CTRT_NO WHERE
AND I.CTRT_NO LIKE #sCtrtNo# || '%'
AND I.CTRT_NM LIKE '%' || #sCtrtNm# || '%'
ORDER BY I.CTRT_NO DESC, I.CTRT_DT DESC ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) TOTAL_CNT FROM CTRT_INFO_F I LEFT OUTER JOIN CTRT_JOIN_CONTR_F J ON I.CTRT_NO = J.CTRT_NO WHERE
AND I.CTRT_NO LIKE #sCtrtNo# || '%'
AND I.CTRT_NM LIKE '%' || #sCtrtNm# || '%'
